homeHero.title: Hi, I am Aimen Altaiyeb
homeHero.text: I specialize in transforming user-friendly UX designs into responsive components, enhanced with engaging micro-interactions.

aboutData.title: Hi There! I'm Aimen Altaiyeb
aboutData.subtitle: Software Engineer
aboutData.text: As a proactive and enthusiastic Software Engineer at GoDaddy in Houston, TX, I focus on crafting user-friendly and efficient applications across the full stack. Known for my positive energy, readiness to assist, and keen eye for debugging, I thrive in collaborative environments and consistently seek to refine my skills through constructive feedback. I specialize in taking user-friendly UX designs and transforming them into responsive components with micro interactions, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.

expertise.title: React Component Development
expertise.text: Developing reusable and modular React components for dynamic web applications.

expertise.title: Front-End Engineering
expertise.text: Creating responsive and engaging user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

expertise.title: CMS Workflow Optimization
expertise.text: Enhancing content management systems for efficient content updates and management.

expertise.title: Full-Stack Development
expertise.text: Building robust applications with both front-end and back-end technologies.

expertise.title: Automated Testing
expertise.text: Implementing comprehensive testing strategies to ensure application reliability.

expertise.title: CI/CD Integration
expertise.text: Utilizing continuous integration and deployment pipelines for seamless code delivery.

skillData.title: Skills & Proficiencies
skillData.text: As a proactive and enthusiastic Software Engineer, I focus on crafting user-friendly and efficient applications across the full stack. Known for my positive energy and readiness to assist, I thrive in collaborative environments and consistently seek to refine my skills through constructive feedback.

portfolioItems.title: Cell Phone Auction App
portfolioItems.subTitle: Java / PostgreSQL
portfolioItems.text: Developed a Java-based console application for cell phone auctions with interfaces for clients, employees, and managers. Managed user details, auctions, and transactions using PostgreSQL, and processed JSON requests between front and back-end.

portfolioItems.title: Crypto Mutual Funds
portfolioItems.subTitle: React.js / Node.js
portfolioItems.text: Developed a full-stack app to track investments using React.js for the front end and Node.js and Express.js for the back end. Created a PostgreSQL database for managing investor data, integrated a cryptocurrency API for real-time updates, and implemented algorithms for calculating investment percentages and returns.

portfolioItems.title: YouTube - ShadowC
portfolioItems.subTitle: TypeScript / SvelteKit
portfolioItems.text: Developed a YouTube clone with full front-end and back-end integration using TypeScript and SvelteKit. Implemented GraphQL for efficient data querying and used Tailwind for responsive UI design.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer
experience.subTitle: GoDaddy
experience.text: Developed React components, streamlined CMS workflows, and optimized CI/CD processes to enhance development efficiency and team collaboration.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.subTitle: Revature
experience.text: Built an Angular SPA, enhanced database models for efficient data retrieval, and implemented AWS S3 image upload to improve project capabilities.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.subTitle: Crypto Mutual Funds
experience.text: Created a full-stack investment tracking app using React.js and Node.js, integrating real-time updates with a cryptocurrency API.
